dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1799 IH: Ensure Military Personnel Learn Opportunities Yielding Vocations that Employ Transitioning Servicemembers Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Van Orden introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand eligibility for a certain program of job counseling, training, and placement service for veterans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensure Military Personnel Learn Opportunities Yielding Vocations that Employ Transitioning Servicemembers Act or the EMPLOY VETS Act.

section.header: Expansion of eligibility for a certain program of job counseling, training, and placement service for veterans

subsection.text: Section 4101 of title 38, United States Code, is amended in paragraph (5)—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking the comma at the end and inserting a semicolon;
in subparagraph (B), by striking power, or and inserting power;
in subparagraph (C), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: a member of the Armed Forces eligible for the Transition Assistance Program under sections 1142 and 1144 of title 10.

subsection.text: Section 4103A(a)(1) of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by inserting and certain eligible persons after eligible veterans;
by redesignating subparagraph (C) as subparagraph (D); and
by inserting after subparagraph (B) the following new subparagraph (C):

subparagraph.text: Eligible persons described in paragraph (5)(D) of section 4101 of this chapter.
